string.text: {=DLm9L9dO}You spent most of your life venerating one of the Asrai deities...
{=O1kJr9x8}Choose your path...
{=NhKa5we6}{ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME}s Part Thieves
{=fxdFKJz4}You have the look of someone who has never seen a speck of black powder nor grease. Are you in the right place?
{=oqIwzbLE}Ah, you have returned. What news do you bring?
{=DZZmTZn7}Come back when you have news.
{=TlrU6WaM}Did you find {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME}?
{=VDO14Mtf}Have you changed your mind and want to help hunt down {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME}?
{=q1Gs2LTI}You again, what do you want?
{=mDuWPnC4}I would like to buy some equipment.
{=YqwYnxCS}I would like to recruit some engineers.
{=d5b5ZpE9}How can I use cannons?
{=3bqJh00v}How can I buy more cannons?
{=OVHnD67y}Nothing at the moment, I must leave.
{=wqYibRtf}I have reconsidered your offer, I would like to help.
{=DX5jg82d}Greetings Master Engineer, I am {PlAYERNAME}. I have come seeking access to the forges of Nuln. Can you help?
{=hxZ5O2fH}I am, I have come seeking access to black powder weapons.
{=UfTsYgU7}Hah! You don’t seem like a person with any knowledge of our crafts. What could you possibly need from us?
{=CZB4u7Dd}I am far too busy for this, leave my sight.

{=3Y1FBJjS}These are the mightiest weapons of the Empire. The Inventions of our Gunnery School are what held back the tide of darkness time and again. Normally we do not hand out our crafts to any who walks in, you have not earned our trust.

{=YkrxXOst}We may however be able to come to an agreement, there is an internal matter that needs urgent attention and I am unable to act. If you help us out, as a personal favour, I will see what I can do for you. What say you?
{=B7ZvkO3G}What would you have me do?
{=vZmOqbTD}I don't have time for this.

{=DfRC9Jin} usually we don’t resort to outside assistance, but we are shorthanded. We have had some important components stolen from the forges of Nuln, and they must be returned. Immediately. If you can track down these runaways and find these parts then we can talk further.
{=hTKDi8wO}I can, as long as our bargain remains the same. I will find him for you, and in return, you will allow me access to the forges of Nuln.
{=C41pt0sH}If this is the only way you will allow me access to the forges, then so be it. I will bring you his head.
{=jMs67166}I’m afraid not, I have other tasks to attend to.
{=LkGfLvfN}We have an agreement then, I believe I may know his whereabouts. I will mark it on your map for you, may Sigmar guide you stranger.
{=PsAVodHA}I understand, I will return the moment I have news.
{=TbnJlrjK}That is all it will take? Sounds easy enough.
{=H9eiOYTn}I do not have time for this.
{=TsNbw3Wo}Good, I expect positive results and your hasty return.
{=VIuBGXLT}A shame, think on it and return if you change your mind.
{=2Y0xrYLi}I am afraid I have failed to bring what you ask.
{=hfgQU1B5}Tsk, I expected better. There may still be time, you can still track them if you are swift
{=m8mZgnlk}I won't let you down a second time.
{=OwwGQoqo}I don't think I can do it at this time.
{=4OcPbotZ}I have returned but without the stolen components, I am afraid to say they are still missing.
{=aOEhSF6W}I see, this is not what I had hoped for. Were there any further clues, did you interrogate these scoundrels?
{=KdM5LbPL}One of the bandits did mention a name, {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} I think?

{=QP69PyPM}Blast! I should have known. If you are willing, I would ask for your assistance once more. This matter may be more dire than I originally imagined. {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} is an engineer, a good one at that, but his works always seemed... wrong.
{=PhunoSRw}If he has stolen these parts, it can only mean some heinous scheme. I must ask that you track him down, and put an end to whatever madness he is trying to concoct. Will you assist us?
{=sge2BKOo}I have yet to track down the runaways.
{=FfUxYOBe}I see, return to me when you have something useful.
{=KwgTljfi}{ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} will no longer be a problem and I have retrieved what he stole from you. I’m unsure what he was trying to do with them.

{=1JqRcgub}It matters not, it would have been something warped no doubt. I must thank you for your efforts, and your discretion. As agreed upon, you may now access our foundries and place orders as you please.
{=c2pWWzTe}Now, what do you need?
{=uVNruJE2}I have yet to track him down
{=HOxPo0qq}I see, return to me when you have better news.
{=AGYl2JvB}Of course, you'll find only the best from the forges of Nuln!
{=z59AtiQG}What else can I do for you?
{=ABDg8Yci}A pair of our novice engineers are eagier to join you for the right price ({RECRUITMENT_PRICE}).
{=fGbCr9wl}Welcome on board.
{=23ob4asT}I don't have the funds for them right now.
{=51gToZNy}On a second thought, maybe later.
{=g7CHC16q}To buy cannons you must be in the service of an Imperial Elector Count
{=YKuIamLX}The amount of cannons you can field in your army increases every 50 levels in Engineering skill.
{=avmLq9dt}If you have met these requirements, simply speak to me and I'll show you what we have.
{=P1v9GNy0}Cannons are placed using the spellcasting Mode, but to fire the cannons you will need to hire at least two Cannon Crew
{=2iXbSPyc}You will also need to ensure that the cannon is in your party inventory
{=tpRMyu7D}Engineers and Cannon Crew can both fire cannons.
{=7UICMg1b}{ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} was right, they sent someone after us! Grab your weapons quickly!
{=JfHEtO4H}Woah, hold there, I have merely come for the stolen parts, there is no need for bloodshed. Perhaps an arrangement can be made?
{=9Ap11h33}Lay down your weapons and I may spare your lives.
{=SpLLn7f7}Weapons or no, we will slay you all and take back what you stole!
{=N1N78C5l}You will not trick us! They will serve a greater purpose! You will not take them!
{=FrNFjJWU}So the old fool sent you after us? How did he figure out my plans? It matters not, you will not stand in the way of my creations. You will die here!
{=aSbzuN9d}Your schemes end here.
{=6GajudVL}Vampire Counts
{=hhVAXlWT}Empire of Men

{=tK2yoCVB}The Vampire Counts are fiends without equal. They seek to topple the civilisations of the living and supplant them with an Undead empire. Each Vampire is a unique and majestic figure with his own personality, drive and ambition. In contrast, their minions are mindlessly obedient - rank after rank of ragged and dirt-encrusted cadavers forced back to life by their masters' necromantic power.

{=nTGe2n7w}The Empire of Man, the sprawling nation of humans dominating the Old World, faces a daily struggle for survival. Guided by their Emperor, Karl Franz, its armies stand as a testament to unwavering discipline and unmatched martial skills. In a world teeming with brutal savages and bloodthirsty monsters, the Empire endures thanks to the renowned discipline of its armies, honed through rigorous training and fortified by their unyielding faith in Sigmar. A beacon of human resilience, the Empire's soldiers exemplify the indomitable spirit of man that prevails amidst its endless list of foes.

{=VCaiHxAA}The Kingdom of Bretonnia is a land renowned for powerful Knights and their strong sense of Chivalry. Guided by the Fey Enchantress and the Damsels of the Lady, the peasants toil while their noble lords protect them from the many dangers threating their survival. In times of war the whole kingdom can join together, led in a crusade against their enemies by King Louen Leoncoeur, against which no foe has known victory.

{=16g38SkH}Mousillon, the accursed state nestled within the heart of Bretonnia, casts a dark and ominous shadow over the land. Once a proud dukedom, it now stands as a grim testament to the corruption that lingers in the shadows. Ruled by the Serpent of Mousillon, the realm of swamps and thickets contrasts against the vibrant setting of noble Bretonnia. Yet, even more tragic and unsettling are its mutated peasantry, ruled not by noble knights but the twisted undead, whose black knights evoke a chilling blend of traditional Bretonnian martial prowess and unholy power.

{=4XC9KfV8}The Asrai are the elvish inhabitants of Athel Loren; they are a suspicious, isolationist and savage kin who live their lives surrounded by the nature of Athel Loren. Their magical forest home is as dangerous as it is beautiful, and it's unforgiving nature has sharpened the skills of its people to a razer's edge. The Asrai live under the teachings of Isha and Kurnous as hunters and warriors defending the Weave and natural world, but darker voices ever seek to tempt them to slaughter and mayhem.

{=SAc6AXKM}Between Nordland and the Wasteland lies the forest of Laurelorn and it's inhabitants, the proud Eonir. They refused to flee the Old World with the rest of their kin and instead stood against and defeated the dwarfish advance on their forest. The Eonir live in a caste society split between the city and forest kin, and maintain their security through careful diplomacy; both with their neighbours and factions as far abroad as the Asur and the Druchii. Their governance works through layers of councils to promote a level of democracy. When the time for battle comes Eonir call on everything from the darkest magic to the purest spirits of the forest to ensure the safety of their home.

{=PcYHxbqv}No one truly knows the origin of Chaos in the mortal world. Even the long-lived scholars of the High Elves can only speculate as to where the forces of Chaos first originated. War, famine, natural disaster and the destroyer known as time have eroded away nearly all indications of the roots of Chaos.

{=oK3ACY6n}I recognise you as My lord and Saviour, and will follow you to the depths of hell and back and back to hell and... - ahem - back.

{=zWmgTvZK}My story? Sure, I can share it.
{=RrX0eJjR}As a boy I discovered I was not like most children, it was not long before the colleges realised this as well.
{=k83JvAp0}Once my affinity for Aqshy was known, I was ripped from my peasant life and become an initiate within the Colleges in Altdorf.
{=b8lEJdu5}That fire in Altdorf a few years back that started in a tavern? Definitely wasn't me!.
{=xFx5QIxv}Most interesting.
{=DbHmrtvN}I am a licensed Bright Wizard from the Colleges in Altdorf. I'm sure by now you have met a few of us and may know how powerful we can be.
{=Gg6IY8GU}The story of my life is insignificant, but I will speak.
{=t8t3vv8g}I was an Orphan left at the doors of the Church, the Cult of Sigmar took me in and raised me.
{=Ml9iFPqn}I have studied many holy scriptures and dedicated my life to the never-ending battle against the filth of Chaos.
{=iHmw0BsS}I roam the countryside and purge heresy with unwavering determination.
{=E6E8ZtZt}This has my consent.
{=gWR1ntiz}Have you finished?
{=iR39ueDK}I am a Witch Hunter, a Templar of Sigmar. The guilty cannot escape me.
{=vlgyUSjA}It is not much of a tale, but I will speak of my life.
{=Y9PpSGug}My mother worked in a brothel, we barely had enough to eat. Never knew my father.
{=cPdmHj1k}I had to learn to defend myself from drunken clients at a very young age. My mother wouldn't leave no matter how much I begged her.
{=Up3NdN0j}One day things went too far, one of her clients was trying to take her life in some kind of strange ritual. I stole his knife and ended it, soon after I left and joined the Templars.
{=jTHiJVh9}You are doing Sigmar's work!
{=blm62rjH}That is downright pitiful.
{=8nTBeNG3}I am a Witch Hunter, a Templar of Sigmar. The guilty cannot escape me.
{=cKFUH4XR}My story isn't that unique, but I don't mind talking about it.
{=6TNvN6JW}I was born the child of a hedge wizard, when I too showed magical affinity I was sent to the Colleges.
{=tQMb0WEq}I was always top of my classes. The others accused me of hubris, but they were merely blinded by their mediocrity.
{=wHx32V62}You cannot find a more promising wizard in the realms of the Empire. I am on the path to surpass Balthazar Gelt himself!
{=YgyTwKrc}I see.
{=HTqBCEwz}Pff, how ridiculous.
{=xUO1qWwo}I am a Light Wizard from the Imperial Colleges. I have no doubts that you have heard of our immense skill.
{=cKFUH4XR}My story isn't that unique, but I don't mind talking about it.
{=6TNvN6JW}I was born the child of a hedge wizard, when I too showed magical affinity I was sent to the Colleges.
{=tQMb0WEq}I was always top of my classes. The others accused me of hubris, but they were merely blinded by their mediocrity.

{=xUO1qWwo}I am a Light Wizard from the Imperial Colleges. I have no doubts that you have heard of our immense skill.
{=MbGlbiTq}I was born into a family of serfs, but working the fields was no life for me!
{=ws9QfDPl}I became the apprentice of a master alchemist, but the bastard taught me nothing yet worked me to death for years.
{=GgFDgPtd}I left him on the side of the road when his wagon broke down one day and joined the army where I learned to maintain equipment. Explosives are my newly found passion.!
{=UbdbFa8o}Most interesting.
{=gWR1ntiz}Have you finished?
{=9BVrG5u4}I am an Engineer experienced in the operation and maintenance of gunpowder weapons.
{=JmYaSBDx}Who I am is second to what I do, I tend to those in need.
{=RjMcxyR9}It has always been my calling to help the sick and wounded, my parents died when I was young and I do not wish for others to experience such pain.
{=hQoBQcYJ}I dedicated my life to Shallya, in return I have been given a gift for healing others.
{=V631STtg}Since I have been travelling the Empire, looking to where my skills are needed most. Tending to peasant and soldier alike.
{=YgyTwKrc}I see.
{=a1LOYlaF}I understand.
{=OWEuXPnD}I am a Priestess of the Goddess Shallya, dedicated to the arts of healing.
{=UDWGtJbR}You don't need to know my story stranger, just my skills.
{=IH2IKH9y}I'm a Court Huntsman, well. I was. Lets just say I missed my mark by the rump of a noble.
{=EQUy46pX}Now I track, hunt and do mercenary work for coin.
{=vqMHDCi8}I have hunted all manner of beast and beastmen, even the occasional orc. My skills go to the highest bidder.
{=ZIbklMH9}I am a Huntsman, many monsters have been slain by my hand in service of the Empire.
{=iBwLfEvf}What matters is my tale, not my name…
{=osVjNeFY}I was admitted to the esteemed Golden College, and quickly distinguished myself among the apprentices.

{=s7MyGrXo}My command of the Wind of Chamon was nearly flawless. Yet, soon Balthasar Gelt arrived, eclipsing all others with his skill. I could have been the greatest Gold Wizard the Empire has ever seen.
{=fEaZSC9H}And yet, not all is lost. I have amassed invaluable knowledge at the College and shall prove my worth across the Old World, while he occupies some dusty seat on some council.
{=EvbrWW2z}Yes… of course.
{=6BHeneqT} Looks like I'll have to settle for the second best Metal Wizard.

{=4V1C55J4}Do not let appearances deceive your eyes; in a short time, I will surpass Gelt. You shall all see. In the meantime, I must hone my skills, preferably by the side of someone competent. Additionally, I expect certain comforts to be assured.
{=RsE6Pu0T}I am a Metal Wizard of the Imperial College, master spellcaster and alchemist.
{=nL5urn3Z}Life is full of questions. I will answer yours.
{=aDMMTlUk}My home was the Drakwald Forest — it's where I was raised and where I felt the nourishing Wind of Ghyran for the first time. People also call us druids.
{=cvM56wii}I look after all things natural and heal the injured, for my magic is one of restoration, not mindless destruction.
{=LoStxBR3}My mission is to uphold the balance between the Empire and nature that feeds us.
{=6vQop84U}A most important duty.
{=zs8MR64E}I am a Life Wizard of the Imperial College. No doubt you have heard of our immense healing capabilities.
{=819FqRjr}You have a curious smell, traveler. Will you listen to my story?
{=qfakaDji}When I was young, I felt a strong connection with all kinds of woodland creatures. And soon I learned to converse with them.
{=2RsKLXJl}When the villagers found out, they charged me with heresy and wished to burn me at the stake. Fortunately, I escaped and hid with the animals in the forest.

{=VvPq6sPP}After a long time in isolation, a wizard of the Amber Order found and invited me to come along. It was him that taught me these abilities don't make you a spawn of Chaos. Instead, they mean blessings of the Wind of Ghur.
{=MQgsr3jd}Citizens of the Empire can be cruel.
{=4fm23da6}No wonder you live in isolation.
{=akQSRoiM}I am a Beast Wizard of the Imperial College. You have certainly heard of our might and talent for survival.
{=UTRXtQcT}Hm, you wish to know of my life? It is a tale I can share.
{=AFRgmcAB}I have always been surrounded by death, death is everything in Sylvania.
{=OPb27ANO}My fate was never to join the undead roaming the land, but to control them. To raise them and bend them to my will.
{=5Mr0met8}It has taken time but the dead do my bidding and my powers are ever growing.
{=UHyBDOCa}I couldn't really care less about your wretched origin.
{=3nuEpFJB}I am a master of death and undeath, many fear me. Do you?
{=75VyXbOg}I do not remember much of my past life, there is only the now and the thirst.
{=xpJcMb4o}Being human feels like a dream, a dream I was happily liberated from.
{=YV0o2o8w}I was taken from my village for the blood tax, but instead I became the desire of my vampire master. I was blessed with the gift of Nagash
{=IMOv9IqV}My master however perished during the vampire wars, with no one else I have been left to wander the night since.
{=UHyBDOCa}I couldn't really care less about your wretched origin.
{=BbI9dlee}I'm a fledgeling Vampire, powerful and undying.
{=EW7cL8Vj}Shattered memories, warrior, soldier? So long ago.
{=ftLr7mBZ}Much is lost, bloodshed, battle, death.
{=ftLr7mBZ}I serve, I fight, I destroy.
{=YgyTwKrc}I see.
{=F5p0prHc}I am a Wight King, servant in death.
{=8olg3lui}Ah, You'd like to hear my story? Very well.
{=FHYY5i18}As you eyes can clearly see, I am a vampire countess.
{=K5stDGW2}However, I sit and wait to see if anybody here is worthy of my time, as tending to the politics of Nefertatas brood bores me to no end.
{=FtugwWgY}And trust me, if you are interested, my services will indeed be very valuable
{=xvDkbPEO}I suppose
{=5zjwuQu6}Well, what do you say then?.
{=nXSJpF7u}I am a Lahmian countess, and not only can I hold myself in battle, but I would be great use to you during travel.
{=0pVGgLII}I have no qualms speaking of my life stranger.
{=UY89LN1b}I was born into a noble family from Carcassonne, my father was a Knight before me.
{=UKdi18l0}It is my duty to become a Knight and I am currently on my quest to gain the favour of the Lady.
{=hLgvuLyV}I have only just set out on my journey, I have much to learn.
{=PyKVKxQg}I hope you will achieve what you set out to do.
{=ZLgdKoEK}You shouldn't have wandered so far from home.
{=FwAHMuwb}I am a questing Knight, devoted in life to the Lady and Bretonnia.
{=JmYaSBDx}Who I am is second to what I do, I tend to those in need.
{=gtrAePLc}It has always been my calling to help the sick and wounded, and like many others, I was rescued and trained for my affinity with the winds of magic.
{=J1SZAxNk}I dedicated my life to the Lady, in return I have been given a gift for aiding her knights.
{=t8XU6ZOG}Since then I have been travelling the lands, looking to where my skills are needed most and tending to peasant and soldier alike.
{=YgyTwKrc}I see.
{=a1LOYlaF}I understand.
{=QS6jVTEN}Hmmph. You'd like to hear my story?
{=kdviHsXP}I was one of those questing knights a long time ago, dedicating my entire life for that damned Lady.
{=OjKpnIN3}But years pass, quest after quest, kill after kill, she still does not think I'm worthy! The bastard!
{=SN30SQMz}So now I no longer follow that road of religion and lip service, I instead look for whoever has the heaviest pouch of coin.
{=pw6uIqdj}Very intruiging.
{=u2sPCDvL}I hope that is the only thing you're looking for.
{=ezAxJtBe}Well, don't waste my time.
{=71LgeWAL}I was still once a Brettonian knight, if you need anything to be slain, I am your warrior.
{=UTRXtQcT}Hm, you wish to know of my life? It is a tale I can share.
{=jIGS48J6}I have always been surrounded by death, death is everything in the swamps of mousillon
{=IUcXXgKZ}My fate was never to join the undead roaming the land, but to control them. To raise them and bend them to my will.
{=JJvse70R}It has taken time but the dead do my bidding and my powers are ever growing.
{=UHyBDOCa}I couldn't really care less about your wretched origin.
{=3nuEpFJB}I am a master of death and undeath, many fear me. Do you?
{=UUqR9oVu}About me? There is not much to tell.

{=KTn60Hzt}I have fought all my life against ruinous powers. I made my own bow with the wood of trees so old that they stood tall when Ariel was just a mortal. I killed my first ungor at the age of eleven, and my first chaos spawn at fourteen. Recently, I struck a troll between the eyes with an arrow from two hundred paces away.
{=eX6RO6dJ}Beasts, monsters, humans, or even other elves, if necessary—any creature that threatens the forest shall feel the sting of my arrows.
{=vd1KouSG}Behold, with each enemy slain, my people cut their forearms to remember each enemy defeated. There remains space for more deaths.
{=8DXcMIw1}It's always good that there are fewer of those disgusting creatures in this world.
{=TH9TPEvE}A boy killing beasts? I find it hard to believe.
{=dpxKDyyz}I am a Guardian Mage of the Toriour caste, an expert in the art of conjuration. I shall deliver the justice of the Eonir.
{=yPvGkDYb}I would prefer not to leave my beloved forests, but for a reasonable fee, I might be persuaded to accompany you on your travels for a time.
{=kuH3V8V1}Insolent boy, you stand before a Guardian Mage of the Eonir.

{=r30YZh45}My lineage descends from an ancient line of warriors, tracing its origins to the War of the Beard itself. Indeed, one of my ancestors stood as the right hand of the great Caledor II, fighting alongside him in the Battle of the Three Towers.
{=eX6RO6dJ}Beasts, monsters, humans, or even other elves, if necessary—any creature that threatens the forest shall feel the sting of my arrows.
{=vd1KouSG}Behold, with each enemy slain, my people cut their forearms to remember each enemy defeated. There remains space for more deaths.
{=sxroTx2j}A proud lineage.
{=TG5xGH7M}Many people claim to be descended from great heroes of the past.
{=yPvGkDYb}Hold a moment, stranger. My services do not come cheap — you’d best prove your worth.
{=uMutfUnO}Ah, I do not believe we have met. Peace be upon you, stranger.
{=NVDmJwqM}Have you not encountered someone like me before? It is not surprising for I am a Spellsinger of the Asrai.
{=BV4u5oHw}Unlike the majority of my people, I possess the rare ability to commune with the magical beings of the deep forest. I can merge their minds with mine and assure their cooperation.
{=fa7FQvxG}For most Elves, the talent I wield amounts to little more than a mere instinct. But in truly gifted ones like myself, it becomes a formidable power.
{=CgRrkE2O}Certainly a fearsome power.
{=zn5OMduq}Those are stories one scares children with.
{=k9g6B6B7}The forest is a living entity. With proper respect, it can be persuaded to follow your command. Many seek out those with my abilities.
{=78ItSRMr}Many desire the presence of a Spellsinger, but few are prepared to pay the price.
{=PadbRW6q}I do not recall seeing you here before. Who might you be?

{=cKtzu3iW}I am the youngest daughter of a humble family that served a distinguished Asrai lord. However, lineage is not everything to us. For years, I have honed my skills with spear, sword, and bow. My bravery and leadership have earned me the title of Glade Captain.

{=myS0VzUr}Yet, I still aspire to reach greater heights. To become a Glade Lady and earn the title of ‘Talon of Kurnous,’ I must build a formidable reputation and demonstrate my prowess to all of Athel Loren.

{=sT9OZVl9}The forest is a living entity. With proper respect, it can be shaped to your will. Many seek out those with my abilities. That is why I have ventured far from home, seeking new challenges to perfect my skills and earn a name that commands respect among the great houses of the Asrai.
{=vx8RgA7w}If you join in my company, I guarantee that you will have that opportunity
{=RdTtY0EJ}An Asrai's duty is in the forest, you should return home.
{=qZ2jkDxV}If your warband could need a second leader in command I am willing to join. I will lead your troops to victory
{=T3H3HShu}Are you a renowned commander? Can you aid me in achieving such a status? I trust you have no objection to proving your worth.
{=PadbRW6q}May Kurnous be with you, Stranger.

{=6vBXuPRO}I am a Waywatcher, a master of ambush and stealth. As a child, I felt the call of the forest coursing through my blood. I was trained to vanish into the wilds, unseen and undetectable, as I awaited my prey.
{=tBEwzHwL}I have ventured deep into the forest, where even the Asrai are not safe. While others remain sheltered in their halls, I have honed my skills and sharpened my aim.
{=J9fCzd5t}Few among the elves can hope to rival a Waywatcher like me with the bow.
{=3koFUAav}Certainly, you must be a prodigy
{=WI9LXeH4}Didn't the Asrai enjoy your company?

{=Vqz4uXnn}I am adept in the arts of survival, disruption, and ambush. I can approach my quarry, strike swiftly, and vanish before its body hits the ground. Alternatively, I can subtly lead it into one of my traps.

{=I07I8XnY}I have but one request. Although I seldom leave the forest, when I do, I seek the pleasures of civilised life. A fine wine in the tavern, pleasant company... I trust your group can provide these comforts.
{=!}黑暗诸神带你来见我，凡人。
{=!}我是混沌神选，受到毁灭之力的祝福。从我在严酷废土诞生的那一刻起，我就被标记为伟大的存在。诸神对我低语他们的秘密，而我听从了他们的召唤。
{=!}我已经走过诅咒之路并变得更强。当弱者紧抱他们虚假的希望和微不足道的道德时，我拥抱了混沌的真理，并获得了超越凡人理解的力量。
{=!}很少有凡人能理解流淌在我血管中的力量。黑暗诸神的祝福如熔铁般在我体内奔流。
{=!}你的自信令人...不安
{=!}是什么驱使你离开废土？
{=!}我是战争与毁灭的大师。别人看到障碍的地方，我看到的是大屠杀的机会。我的刀刃品尝过无数敌人的鲜血，我的盔甲承载着千次战斗的痕迹。弱者在我面前逃跑，强者倒在我的威力之下。
{=!}在为你效力时我只寻求一样东西——传播混沌并向黑暗诸神证明我价值的机会。给我敌人去粉碎，给我战斗去赢得，我会忠实地为你服务。但如果你背叛我，你将了解为什么连恶魔都畏惧神选。
{=n6ZASJ3A}Earn 20% more xp from battles.

{=BCGOxwvk}By accepting you are becoming a Vampire, this decision is permanent and can't be changed back for the rest of your playthrough.{newline}{newline}By Becoming a vampire, you will be stripped of your magic(beside Minor Magic ) and faith skill.{newline}{newline}Beside that you will gain Vampire powers.... {newline}{newline}See more in the Wiki for more information.{newline}{newline}The Dialog can be restarted if you decline.

{=co0Dfv5I}By accepting you are becoming a Blood Knight Vampire, this decision is permanent and can't be changed back for the rest of your playthrough.{newline}{newline}By Becoming a Blood Knight Vampire, you will be stripped completly of your spellcraft and faith skill, and will not be able to perform magic. {newline}{newline}Beside that you will switch to the melee focused Bloodknight Career{newline}See more in the Wiki for more information.{newline}{newline}The Dialog can be restarted if you decline.

{=FLA8wuZv}By accepting you are becoming a Mousillon Knight, this decision is permanent and can't be changed back for the rest of your playthrough.{newline}{newline}By Becoming a Knight of Mousillon, you will be stripped of your faith skill. {newline}{newline}See more in the Wiki for more information.{newline}{newline}The Dialog can be restarted if you decline.

{=jzw6cWjF}By accepting you are becoming a Necrach Vampire, this decision is permanent and can't be changed back for the rest of your playthrough.{newline}{newline}By Becoming a vampire, you will be stripped of Life Magic or Light magic (if you posess it), and the faith skill.{newline}Beside that you will gain Necrach powers.... {newline}See more in the Wiki for more information.{newline}{newline}The Dialog can be restarted if you decline.

{=WeIBjMGv}As Vittorio draws nearer, the glint of his finely crafted rapier catches your eye, and a warm smile spreads across his face as he appraises you. "Ah, what a stroke of luck to meet again on this lonely path," he says, his voice carrying a playful undertone. "I see the fire of a warrior still burns within you." {inky_DeniedBefore2}

{=uZKitvm8}Ah, what a stroke of luck to meet a band of worthy warriors on this lonely path," they say. "I am Vittorio de Luca, a master of the blade from the distant lands of Tilea. I have journeyed far and wide, seeking a worthy adversary who can match my skills in combat. And now, fate has led me to you. Care to prove your skills in a friendly duel, with a little wager to make it exciting?
{=9VAaQRbm}If this is your wish. fine.
{=xSt5AUnX}A hireling? Surely I have use for you. Just note that I am not accepting any additional troops.
{=GjNB4JtC}The Empire needs fresh blood, surely I have use for you. Just note that I am not accepting any additional troops.
{=BWiaeBOc}Serving the country in the knightly Service is the highest duty among Bretones. Just note that I am not accepting any additional troops.
{=gYnW87Dn}Arrr Freshblood. Sure I have use for you. Just note you will serve me and I tolerate no further sheep in my warband.
{=x0amQYaS}A hired sword? How convienient. Just note you are serving me, and I have no use for more peasants.
{=pRpC6oud}Pack your gear. I expect you in my rows Immediately.
{=qngvft4u}Pack your gear. The Empire needs you.
{=GSPOI8OW}A welcome decision. There is no higher duty than serving the Land of the Lady.
{=nVpjbnw6}Get out of my sight there is work to do!
